meanings.definition: The state or quality of being timeless or eternal.
meanings.sent1: Her beauty seemed to possess an agelessness that captivated everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The agelessness of the ancient ruins left visitors in awe of their enduring splendor.
meanings.sent3: The agelessness of the classic fairy tale characters made them beloved by generations.
meanings.sent4: His music had an agelessness that transcended time and touched the hearts of listeners.
meanings.sent5: The painting's agelessness seemed to whisper secrets of the past to those who gazed upon it.

meanings.definition: The condition of not showing signs of aging or getting older.
meanings.sent1: Despite her advanced years, her skin retained a remarkable agelessness that puzzled many.
meanings.sent2: The fountain of youth was said to possess waters that granted agelessness to those who drank from it.
meanings.sent3: The agelessness of the vampire character in the movie provided a humorous twist to the storyline.
meanings.sent4: His fitness routine promised an agelessness that defied the natural process of aging.
meanings.sent5: The elixir claimed to offer agelessness to those who sought eternal youth.
